body:
I use go run, it create to process like this
```
xxy             58193   0.0  0.0 573375368   1264 s015  S+    7:02PM   0:00.00 /var/folders/bt/wq6vgz511576mz4l7_4m075c0000gn/T/go-build247179261/command-line-arguments/_obj/exe/test
xxy             58162   0.0  0.1 573406976   9220 s015  S+    7:02PM   0:00.04 go run test.go
```

it not work when i  kill 58162 , but work if I kill 58193~
